title: One star from each course
notes: You must complete one star in each of the regular courses.

title: One star from each water course
notes: You must complete one star in each of the water courses.

title: Complete all of the slide stars
notes: You must complete every star that requires using a slide.

title: One coin star
notes: You must complete at least one coin star.

title: All coin stars
notes: You must complete all coin stars.
